location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Photograph of a flatbed truck. Photographer unknown.

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:60 mm x 61 mmCondition:There is a glue mark on the bottom margin of the photograph.Foliation:The photograph bears a circled 56. The folio number that should be used for referencing purposes is on the plastic sleeve in which the photograph is held (48)Process:Silver-gelatin

mods.abstract: Subject Matter:View of a six-wheel flatbed truck, manufactured by the Autocar Company, USA, and used by the California Arabian Standard Oil Company at Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. The truck is stationary and stands on a sandy surface. The photograph is identical, but is a mirror image on the x-axis, of the previous photograph in the file (f 47).
